name: Canonical Observability Stack
description: At Canonical, we have been referring to LMA as a system of machine charms currently in use to monitor Canonical and customer systems. COS draws a lot of learning from years of operational experience with LMA, but it is also different enough that we felt we needed to make a distinction from the previous iteration.

name: Kubeflow AI/MLOps
description: Canonical Charmed Kubeflow is a state of the art, fully supported MLOps platform that helps data scientists collaborate on AI innovation on any cloud from concept to production, offered by Canonical - the open source experts.

name: FinOS Charmed Operators
description: The Fintech Open Source Foundation (FINOS) is an independent nonprofit organization whose purpose is to accelerate collaboration and innovation in financial services through the adoption of open source software, standards and best practices. FINOS projects have used Juju and Charmed Operators (also known, more simply, as a “charm”) to deliver an enterprise-grade experience hen deploying, integrating and operating application stacks in a multi-hybrid-cloud environment.
